p: RSV and influenza data was obtained from the records maintained by the Virology Laboratory (Facultad de Medicina, UASLP, San Luis Potosí, Mexico) [ 12, 19– 20]. The time series for influenza and RSV infections are shown in Fig. 2. Most of the samples submitted to our laboratory during the study period were obtained from children under 5 years of age evaluated at the Emergency Department or admitted to Hospital Central “Dr. Ignacio Morones Prieto”.
